features: 1080P HD CAMERA - 1080P HD video quality, makes sure you can see exactly what is happening inside your home and Let you go out without worry.
TWO-WAY AUDIO - Two-way voice real-time intercom voice, smooth call, easy communication.

SMART MOTION DETECTION - Intelligent alarm, safe and worry free, when the smart alarm is triggered, the push message is sent to the mobile phone in real time, and the abnormality is first known to ensure security.
DUAL STORAGE - This indoor security camera supports cloud storage and built-in micro SD slot, store your data and recordings locally with an extra SD card (not included) or in the cloud.
EXCELLENT NIGHT VISION - 10m night vision, guard your nighthigh frame night vision, 3D noise reduction, clean and clear image.
355°horizontal & 110° wide angle lens make up a 360°complete coverage, which protect your baby, pet, elder and nanny full day.
body.description: For Video: Resolution: 1080P (1920×1080); High image quality; 108° View Angle; Day/Night mode automatically; Infrared night vision up to 8-10 meters; Dual stream video; Two-way Audio; For storage: TF Card & Cloud Storage, up to 128G TF Card; For network: 2.4G WiFi; Support hang mounting; DC 5V input, Type-C interface; Share camera with family; 6X digital zoom; Support on iOS/Android mobile and web; For privacy Indoor Camera for Baby/Pet/Nanny/Security surveillance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Take you into smart life 1080P HD 360° Wide View Two-way Audio IR Night Vision TF Card & Cloud Storage Smart Motion Tracking and Active Alert Konnek Stein 1080P Full HD Home Camera Scan QR code to download app or google play, which support Android, IOS devices etc. Wireless security camera can setup quickly via 2.4GHz WiFi (Not support 5G). Built-in enhanced microphone and speaker, talk and listen to your love or scare off the unexpected person on cloud app in real time even if you are not at home, which gives you peace of mind and 24-hour protection. The camera equipped with an advanced built-in anti-noise microphone and speakers, you can easily talk to your baby/elder/pets and monitor them anywhere, anytime. The security camera will be an important part of your smart home system, which provides protection for your children, pets, and the elderly.

1080P HD IP Camera Indoor camera give you 360 ° panoramic shooting without blind area, can as a monitor to protect your baby, pet, elder full day, provides amazing 1080P Full HD video quality and IR night vision, to make sure that capture all the details for your house or office security all day effectively. Two-way Audio You can control Konnek Stein indoor camera just by using your phone, anytime to see, hear, and speak to people and pets in your home from your smartphone with live view and two-way audio. Motion Tracking You can use a 1080p camera to detect moving objects and use motion tracking to automatically track and capture their movements.

For your maximum personal privacy security, the optional cloud servers assigned in the United States can completely avoid data breaches happen. Solved your concerns about privacy being stolen problem completely. This IP camera supports both local 128GB SD card storage and cloud storage. NOTE: (SD card not included)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's got some lag.
reviews.reviewText: Nice picture. Easy to set up. Easy to monitor. It does lag quite a bit, however. Especially the two-way talk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars So hard to connect
reviews.reviewText: I find it hard to connect and the red lights are a bit annoying. I am returning it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Camera
reviews.reviewText: The setup isn’t hard.Download the app.Create an accountAdd the camera and connect to wifi.The Manuel is easy to follow.I had a little hard time have the camera scan the barcode to connect to wifi. ( Make sure your phone’s light is all the way on)Image on the camera is super clear with wide views. (See photo to understand)The camera does need to be plug it. If you unplug, you can plug it back and it will reconnect itself. It willmake noise when it does as if you were connecting it for the first time.The camera has the capability for you to manually move at 360 degrees. The camera itself doesn’t move.Two ways to store data, TF Card & Cloud Storage (You have to purchase separately like most security camera)If you want alerts send to your phone, or text notification or cloud storage from smartlife, that’s additionalI have included the pricing of the storage cloud, phone notification and text notification. (See photo to understand)Without any services or SIM card, it does take images of detect movement. It will not notify you when it happen, you must open the app and view the images.(See photos to understand)There is privacy mode.I found it a little difficult to find a place to hide it without people seeing the camera since it has to be plugged in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars No longer works as have to sign up for Smart Life
reviews.reviewText: I have placed this camera facing out a front window to get a view towards my driveway as the majority of time is spent in the back rooms. This camera works fine enough to view what I need it to, but is not the fine HD view you get facing into the home of course. I was really interested in it as the ad had mentioned it was Alexa compatible which would have been great viewing thorough the Show 8. But as noted in an earlier review, they are working on the Amazon Alexa Agreement, per their customer service rep. I would have preferred that instead having to have the app opened on my phone.Please note when setting the camera up, no matter how strong your wi-fi seems where you are using the camera, it states in the manual to be by your router to set it up. And even though I have no problems setting up other items away from the router, I had to be next to the router to set up the camera. But after initial set up, it works just fine where I want it to.Update:, my camera stopped functioning as it runs though the app Smart Life, and it looks like you have to register and/or set up an account with them. As this is the only camera I have going thru that app, I did not register with them so the camera is useless. As I have a lot of Blink cameras, this is no longer needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It’s difficult to use I thought I signed up for the app and it doesn’t record any videos so far
